name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert MORTON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert MORTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence S. Rosenwald, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Nancy Wasser, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 495
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert MORTON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Lawrence S. Rosenwald, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Nancy Wasser, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
